content.detailedDescription: Sitting on the water of the atlantic ocean in  marathon , florida watching the super moon around 9:30 pm. a bright red object just appeared out of nowhere over the adjacent island about 500 ft up. the object was pulsing red light in no set pattern. it appeared to be hovering at times while ascending. object made no noise. flight pattern was erratic. watched object for about 1 min  before it vanished. i thought object was a plane at first but after watching it for a minute i realized it was definitely  not an airplane. i was very excited. this is my second sighting in 15 years.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed ufo ascending upward and was flying eratically. very slow , silent ascent. was pulsing with red light then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: Driving down street notice the big moon & bright light while going home. how bright the it was. thought it was a big star or planet. a big bright light by moon look like a circle hoover by moon. my feeling says it is a spaceship..Not surprised at all i'm a believer.  did not lose sight at all.
content.summary: Bright light  circular in shape

content.detailedDescription: At the time, i was 18 yrs old. i was on my 3rd flr bedroom sleeping.  my mother came & woke me and said "i have to show  you something".  i went downstairs to her bedroom on the 2nd floor and we saw the ufo hovering over a building across the parking lot behind my house. i knew it was a ufo as soon as i saw it.  it looked to be between 20-25 yards in length.  it had a row of 4 colored lights that rotated around the whole craft.  they looked to be approx. 4'x8'. there was a small dome on the bottom of the craft.  there was a windshield approx. 10'x40' above the lights and i could see several occupants in thru the windshield.  i observed 2 tall occupants and 4 shorter ones.  i then told my mom i was going to go to my bedroom to get my telescope to get a closer look.  i don't remember what happened after that.  the next thing i remembered was walking down the steps (without my telescope). my mom was standing in the 2nd flr hallway and told me the ufo went straight up and was gone in 2 seconds.  we then just said good night and didn't mention the incident. i turned around and as i was walking upstairs to my bedroom, my brain was "empty" with no thoughts, almost "zombie-like".  my arms were hanging straight down by my side and my eyes were looking at the kickboards of the stairs as i was walking up the steps.  it felt like i was on an escalater. i never mentioned anything of this incident to anyone for several years, not even my family or closest friends.  (a month later on vacation in maine, myself, mother, father & cousin went for a midnight walk and we witnessed 3 ufos flying in a "v" shape formation at a high speed that looked like they were up in the stratusphere.  in a split-second, all 3 dispursed.  the very next night, at the same time and place, the exact same thing happened again.)
content.summary: Saw ufo hovering over building across from my home at the time.

content.detailedDescription: On 8-10-2014 my husband and i went to south portland's "bug light" on the ocean front to take pictures of the super moon.  when we arrived about 7:30 the moon was hidden behind clouds as it had started to rise.  when the moon emerged from the clouds around 8pm i took pictures of it and of the lights across the water.  when i got home and put the pictures on my imac i had 5-6 pictures of ufos.  some were large whitish spheres and one was a small light that i magnified and saw was a tear shaped object that looked like many other reported ufos on filer's files.  this was the second time spheres have appeared on pictures i have taken on the maine coast.  the first i sent was 11-20-2011 at scarborough beach.  it was reported on mufon and i was told it was sea spray.  it wasn't. image 0326-large sphere is barely visible in the upper middle of the picture; image 0323-large sphere is more prominent and visible to the left upper section of photo above the super moon.  there is a very faint large sphere above and to the right of the super moon, as well. image 0319 shows the light sphere in the upper left corner; 0322 shows a small lighted object in the right upper corner when magnified shows a tear or bell shaped ufo.  image 0330 shows a sphere in the right upper corner.
content.summary: I saw large orbs after viewing photos taken.  i also noted an object that looked like a tear shaped ufo after magnifying the photo.

content.detailedDescription:
I was photographing the thunder over michigan airshow at willow run airport in ypsilanti michigan at around 1 p.M. i did not see the object, but when i examined the digital photos i discovered an anomaly on only one of the digital photos. i was taking pictures of a p-51 mustang that was performing and was taking multiple photos in rapid succession. the anomaly is on only one of the photos. when i blew it up using photoshop elements and adjusted brightness and contrast, i see an oval shape.  

again, this appears on only one frame. it was a sunny day, my digital camera was set at iso 400, shutter speed slow to blur the propeller at 1/160, aperture stopped down to f/29. it is not lens flare, the sun was behind me, and again, it is only one frame out of many.   i would appreciate it if you could analyze the photo and render an opinion.
content.summary: I discovered an anomaly on a digital photograph

content.detailedDescription: We sitting in our pull deck my wife and i talking when i saw 2 light heading our way i pointed it to my wife them it became 4 and 5 could have been more but the trees was blocking our view first surprise them as they got closer they move toward the west to penn at very fast speed a lot of people must had seen them it was a beautiful night and the big moon was out this happen last night 8-9-14 my wife actually got scare
content.summary: 5 orange balls were coming from the pine bush area

content.detailedDescription:
I was tracking the iss using the virtual sky app on my ipad. as the iss came into view from the west i could watch it with the naked eye. the sky was well lit by the super moon and the very few large clouds were at around 5-8 thousand feet. other than that the sky was clear. i was facing south just as the iss passed overhead. it was travelling at a steady pace with what looked like a smaller service module just ahead of it. as the iss passed just to the left of the moon 3 very bright lights in a perfectly symmetrical triangle faded into view. they were huge like watching a constellation but slowly ascending in the southern sky almost parallel to the moon. i tried aiming my ipad at it a few times to see if it was an object of interest in the virtual sky app but nothing was showing up. the iss was now heading well into the south east and after approximately 10 seconds the lights began to fade out all the while steadily ascending and maintaining their perfect triangular formation. 
i am an amateur astronomer, keen aircraft enthusiast and like to think i have a pretty good grasp of most things that fly. i have seen many satellites, meteors, iridium flares, rocket launches and even a few comets. this event was none of the above. it was definitely not  aircraft(that i know of) or chinese lanterns due to its size and brightness.
i mentioned seeing the iss on social media when a friend nearby sent me a message asking if i had seen anything else? it turns out he had also seen these lights.
content.summary: 3 huge bright lights appear while watching iss pass overhead.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside with my landlord and had my binoculars and wanted to see if i could find venus.I spoted something that looked like a black circle and it would not move so i showed my landlord and then i keeped looking at it for about five minuets and all of a sudden another identical black circle started to rise from under it and about two minuets later another.They all ended sitting in the sky in a line and never left the pattern they were in.The only movement was them lining up in the same pattern that orions belt would be in.The whole time this is going on a coulp of jets flew from left to right and from right to left and then a bigger jet flew around.About two minuets after they all just disappeared.They were up very high so they could not just disappear behind anything.From were i live it looked like it was in the direction of stewart air base but very far from me.You would not be able to see it with out binoculars.And the shy was crsystal clear.I had another sighting two ears ago and never responded back on it but it was an object that hovered for like 20 minuets and looked absoulutly like what they showed on tv once and it was in florida i think.Dont want you to think i am nuts.I never see stuff like this.
content.summary: Me and my land lord were outside 15 min after sunset and i spoted a black circle rising and then two more from the same spot and they all stayed in same area then three jets flew in the area and they then disapeared.The wind had no effect on them.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home saw a large orange light in the sky it stopped hovered for about 30 seconds the moved south elevating, orange glow dimmed and object went sw . lost sight of object as it ascended it went from a large basketball size to the size of a baseball
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright square or diamond shaped glowing a solid orange

content.detailedDescription:
While sitting with a friend watching tv in my home, i glanced out my window from my sofa to see an object rise to the sky from behind the building in front of my home. it looked like a star but no other stars that i could see. it was dusk. i knew what it was right away as it's not the first time i've seen this type of thing in the sky.I told my friend to look at the star just (at that time,level with the church steeple) in front of us and not to take eyes off it! we both sat by the window for around 20 mins. during that time it did not move at all! i could tell it was a good distance away but i don't know exactly. i felt very excited and also a bit scared.
suddenly it started to descend the same way it rose when i first noticed it. my friend was excited to see this as he's never seen this before. he wasn't freaked by it but said it was weird and he could not explain it.
a few minutes later my friend left but before he left, he suggested recording it if it happened again. 
15 minutes after i saw descend,it rose again as before but this time higher than the church steeple till it stopped.
at this point i started to record it. 
it stayed at this higher place for a few minutes then descended again till obscured by the building in front of me. i could not tell where,how far or if it indeed landed. i stayed by the window for hours after waiting for it to appear again but it never did.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Light rises in sky from unknown origin, hovers for 20 mins then descends to unknown location

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my vespa on the ss sorrentina towards vico equense and my son noticed a light still in the sky. i stopped and  together kept watching the object that was still for few minutes and i took a couple of pictures. the shape of the object was like a v upside down, grey colored, with a couple of white trial below.  than i noticed the object started moving and than i took a videoclip during wich i noticed the object disappeared (see the attached videoclip).
content.summary: The object was still for few minutes  and than disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I and my father were stood outside having a cigarette, looking out for shooting stars as i heard there was meant to be (10 august '14) we tracked a couple of dull star looking comits  (we guessed) after about 4 mins of that we spotted a really bright star travel across the sky above us,fast.. but fairly slow. we watched as it caught up with the clouds (which were going pretty fast.) it then came out the other side, seemed to sort of hover slightly then it shot extraordinarily fast, ridiculously fast with no sound but a long blue flash followed behind but dissappeared all in less than a second. i felt absolutely extatic that i'd seen something truely unexplainable, a huge sense of relief &happiness.
content.summary: Spotted a bright star like orb thing from right above me & watched it travel slowly then shot across the sky in the blink of an eye.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my computer, in my living room when i lost focus, and realized there was a floating light in the sky, i called over a family member to also see the light, when i realized... i had my phone! i took out my photo took a photo and some video, and while i was filming, the light disappeared. (i am uploading this from my ipad, while the photos and videos were on my phone so took photos of the photos, on my ipad , so sorry if you see part of my phone case.)
content.summary: Short lived, light, disappeared, strange.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my living room watch the toronto blue jays game on television with my husband.  at 7:02 pm alberta time, so it would have been 5:02pm toronto time on august 9th/14.
2) i myself did not notice it.  my husband drew my attention to it.
3) i,at first, thought it was an insect.
4) object appeared in the distance.  it's path was straight up at a velocity i have never seen before.
5) i had been taping the game.  so i could see it over and over to verify our first thought of an insect, was incorrect.  i was in a state of denial.  then i decided to tape a video of it with the intention of contacting mufon with the footage.  it is attached to this report.
6). it went straight up. as we were not at the game we can not say.  this sighting is so quick, literally blink and it's gone.
content.summary: Watching baseball game when camera pans out to view stadium, an extremely fast accent.

content.detailedDescription: Was at home watching tv about 9pm it is in front of a window when it/they brilliant white lights came into view from behind the house opposite were there are fields, i ran upstairs and called my son for a better look as i had no idea what i was looking at and wanted him to see also, he was as shocked as i we just couldn't believe what we were looking at, 5/6 brilliant white glowing balls in the shape of the letter c moving slowly from left to right the balls were pulsating i have never seen lights so bright, after a few moments a tree was obstructing our view ,as the lights looked like they were getting past the obstruction they reversed we just saw them at the outer edge when they seem to have gone in another direction it was then we thought of pictures and got a phone out in case we could see them but we unfortunately didn't, we were just so stunned and shocked it didn't occur to us, we are kicking ourselves now.I hoping someone can tell me what we saw.
content.summary: 5/6 glowing white balls in the shape of a letter c about 100ft off the ground

content.detailedDescription:
1. driving through corn field
2. large bright blimp like light traveling alongside car
3. air balloon/blimp
4. traveled slowly horizontally, stopped in midair, rotated 360 deg 2-3 times in 5 mins
5. surprised 
6. we drove away

glowing orb with a dark spot in miiddle with red flashing light on side,floating in sky, stopped and rotated in place at least 3 times in less than 5 mins
content.summary: Glowing orb with a dark spot in miiddle with red flashing light on side,floating in sky, stopped and rotated in place at least 3 times in less than 5 mins

content.detailedDescription:
August 9th 2014 at approx. 11:37pm my spouse and i sitting on porch ... saw a orange ball of flame between two planes heading east towards us, at first thought it looks like a plane on fire or an upside down hot air balloon on fire, it seem to hovered as i tried to get a photo which reviled two lights, as we stared at the object we then  realized it it started moving backwards then it disappeared. 
the retraction occurred so fast that my spouse and i agreed that it was probably not a plane, because we see planes fly bye everyday and never saw one moved this fast.
the retraction of this object seemed to have happened in a fraction of a second. then there was no traces of anything else left of the object or objects.
the strange thing is that my photo of the object shows two lights and the and size of the object is different.
the photo shows two star like dots that has a white glow,  ....  but we saw an orange ball of fire, but we then realize that the photo must have taken the craft as it was pulling away.
content.summary: August 9th approx. 11:37pm my spouse and i sitting on porch then saw a orange ball of flame between two planes heading east towards us, at first thought it looks like a plane on fire

content.detailedDescription: Object appeared to be a really bright orange ball (fireball/street lamp)descending getting little bit larger. stopped and hovered then started moving in an irregular oddly shaped circle in the sky. the objected appeared to be getting smaller (suggesting gain in altitude perhaps?) to our left (south west) a brighter than normal civilian aircraft came into view. the civilian aircraft did not react just flew in a straight line till they no longer visible. object was flying east by north east following aircraft barely visible.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Course changing orange orb

content.detailedDescription: I was taking video of a lighting storm, i went back through the video frame by frame looking for lighting strikes when i noticed the objects during a flash from the storm. there were different objects in two separate flashes but both were gone in the next lighting flash. not sure if its anything of interest just thought i'd let you decide. in the pic with the disk on the right of the screen when i magnify on my computer a frame seems to appear that resembles an acorn, it could just be my computer.
content.summary: Objects appeared during a lighting storm

content.detailedDescription:
Sat in chair 1130pm 6/8/2014
butlins ingoldmells facing roughly south , looking directly 
up .. object took 3 second to fly from full field of vision ..Left to right.. followed object out if sight in 1 second after moving position.....No sound or nav lighting , single whiteish illumination

either low orbit sat/mil or ufo 

note - object faster then iss or satillite.....
content.summary: Really fast high speed dot

content.detailedDescription: Saw an object behind trees, was very bright, on both ends very bright lights, in the middle small ones. it decended down then it disappeared. i thought it might come back, it did not.
content.summary: Watched a bright object descend behind trees, size of a large van then it dissappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Just had an unexpected sighting at approx 5.20 am aug 10. went outside to look for my marine radio out of a bag in my truck so i could make sure it was charged before we head out today. also wanted to check on weather. caught a lightning strike out of the corner of me eye so i started staring a the clouds to make sure i'd seen lightning. all of a sudden a large bright white light appeared from nowhere dropping down and then changed direction by what looked like 90 deg away from me. it headed towards the grey clouds and faded out.

i had to rub my eyes and assure myself i just saw that. the whole thing took about 5 seconds. the way the light went off was weird as if it shrunk into a fine point. spent the next 20 minutes just looking and hoping to see something more. pretty cool whatever it was...

at 1st i thought it may be a satellite of the iss but the controlled drop down flight path and subsequent direction change and fade out had me thinking otherwise. suddenly i knew i'd seen something that wasn't normal or natural. it had intelligent control.  the fade out and shrink down to nothing keeps playing over an over in my mind. about 5 minutes later i heard and aircraft but couldn't spot it. probably just normal traffic to las vegas.

i am part of a ufo watch group. the last 2x we've been out with the group, we've had anomalies. something flashes up in the sky that defies logic. last time we had 2 white flashes from a stationary object  to the nw and the time before that about 6 weeks ago, we had several orange flashes from an object high up in the night sky right above us. fascinating stuff!
content.summary: Bright light materialized, faded out after 90 deg direction change

content.detailedDescription: Yesterday i was waiting for my friend. he came to my home and we sat outside of it bcz there is gt road in front of my house and we always sitting there. we just talking about our country and i was seeing the road and suddenly i saw a bright and glowing light. i thought its just a plane but i recognize that i never saw a plane with bright lights and if its a plane it never go that high and it never go that high and it never go that way because the airport is not that side. what i saw is a bright light it just like glowing and then its brightness get down but still lighting and it just fly straight and then vanished suddenly. it takes 2 to 4 seconds after it vanished i said to my friend did you saw that and he just said what did you see now you always scare me with those words. he said this because couple of days ago i and my friend was sitting same place as yesterday ,i saw a car is get up on the wall of the road and then it fell down but nothing happened to car and its passenger. after all what ever it was i saw it with my own eyes and after that i saw a plane and i am pretty sure its not looking like that thing. thanks.
content.summary: I saw a bright light flying and then its vanished.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving with girlfriend. the dash and ground lit up with the brightness lightning would give. by seing this i knew it wasn't from this earth. the object hovered for 20 second.No sound at all. been waiting a lifetime to see one and after it left i was scared. object just disapered but was seen 50 miles away few min later. was in the newspaper other witneses.
content.summary: Was driving. ealy morning the das lit up .Stopt car looked up seen very large blue sphere. lit the ground like liightning would.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving north on route i 95 at the mass/new hampshire border at 9 o'clock on 8/9/2014. i looked out window to east and saw craft approx 500 to 1000 ft above traveling along highway at approx 100 mph. craft was approx 20 feet wide could not see length of craft or shape. it paralleled the highway and passed us. approx 2 miles ahead i saw craft hovering over side of highway and as we passed it we slowed down and i rolled down window to listen, no sound was observed .It then passed us again and flew diagonally over highway toward the north west at approx 100 mph then we lost sight. approx 20 min later we turned off highway i 95 onto route 236 in maine and drove about 6 miles when i saw same craft and said oh no it looks like its hovering above the general vicinity of our neighborhood in south berwick maine . my wife became very nervous i was very curious. then we lost sight through the trees and did not see craft again. craft flew from approx salisbury mass. thru new hampshire to south berwick maine. drone? ufo? there were many other cars on road at the time
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Dark object two white lights on left side 2 white lights on right side red light going side to side in middle in sequence

content.detailedDescription: Was loading son up in grandma's truck at cvs. i looked up just to see the green light move in a straight line and disappear. reminded me of a green firecracker. asked mother if she seen it in the southern sky around an military base named ellington field, but not 100 per cent that is the direction for the base. i was a little excited.
content.summary: Glowing green light

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was at work taking trash out to the dumpster.
2. i looked up and noticed that craft fly over head.
3. thought the craft was a plane at first but heard no noise.
4.Looked up and saw the craft fly over head around 300mph"guessed speed". noticed a window on the bottom of the craft and what looked like a person standing in there. 
5. i felt like no one was going to believe me. 
6. flew behind a wall i was standing against.
content.summary: Fly by

content.detailedDescription: I had just clocked off work at 2200 and was walking to my car. the car park is ringed with trees. at first low on the horizon, i could see the object through the branches. originally i thought it was a helicopter with its brightly flashing lights, but as it cleared the trees i realized it was absolutely silent and it wasn't emitting a regular flash, and there were no other white or blue lights. instead, and the best description i can give, is that it was as a bright pink to red 'welding arc' emitting small sparks from itself as it moved from the southwest to the northeast. i lost sight of the object as trees on the far side of the car park obscured my view. it wasn't like a firework in that it's intensity and its direction of travel did not vary, from the time i first noticed it; as it was overhead; and as it carried on out of my view. i stood for a moment to absorb what i had seen. i'd never seen anything like this before, and haven't since.
content.summary: Like a bright pink to red 'welding arc' moving noiselessly across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Cat and mouse chase between two entities scrambling over each other from south to northwest.  this can't be described as human as it seemed like it was over 40000 ft up in the night..
content.summary: Cat and mouse chase over horizon to horizon

content.detailedDescription:
I don’t know if this means anything but something happened in august of 1959. it’s been bothering me for years and i’ve only told my brother about it. i was born in the small abitibi town of iroquois falls, ontario and at the age of four, my father got a job in falconbridge, ontario just outside of sudbury. it might be interesting to know that cfb falconbridge, a norad scramble air base was operating near by. the jets used to fly over often.

i was 6 years old at the time and used to get up at around 5:00 am and out to play shortly after. our town’s main street had a gas station, restaurant and department/grocery store. the other side of the street was empty as it was the lip of what we called the pot hole. it was where the first mine was. it was strip mining.

i was playing by the gas station by myself when i saw an object that flying very fast into the pot hole and i was sure it was one of the jets crashing. it didn’t make any noise (i don’t really remember) but there was no crashing noise, i had run up to the pot hole (less than a minute) and there was nothing there so i ran to the fence on the east end and at that location you could see for miles and miles around. there was no sign of a plane anywhere.

i wandered around for a short time very puzzle about the whole thing. i was also very hungry and went home to have some breakfast. my mother asked me where i had been all day. it was late afternoon. if seeing that object was puzzling, not knowing where i had been all day surly took the cake.

i tried to tell my mom about it but she thought i was making up a story. i never discussed this with anyone until years later when i told my brother. he believed me and said i should report it. i never told anyone else and never knew where i could report it to until i saw your show “hanger 1” and checked you out on the net. i’ve waited for a while but finally decided to write you. probably nothing will come of it but i thought i might let you know my story.
content.summary: I saw the object and thought it was going to crash. after finding nothing i lost some time.
